Articles.Content:
Because it is christmas season and I like the option to distribute my money freely between seller, publisher and charity and overall like it when business does at least something for society, I am taking the liberty to advertise:

The weekly Humble Bundle with Lunar Flight (not knowing if it is any good though ):

https://www.humblebundle.com/weekly

As well as the books bundle (not being a bronie myself but being sympathetic of harmless hobbies )

https://www.humblebundle.com/books
